duties_responsibilities.duty: Successfully managing all store operations tasks to maximize sales results and bring 'Our Burlington' values to life in the store.
Mentoring, coaching, and leading a team in delivering excellent customer service and a world-class shopping experience.
Overseeing all day-to-day merchandising, operations, and service management tasks.
Direct management and oversight of Assistant Managers, Supervisors, and Store Associates to ensure implementation of established company policies, standards, and initiatives.
Recruitment, screening, and hiring of associates to meet store staffing needs.
Facilitating onboarding, training, and structured learning activities for all team members.
Handle personnel and associate relations issues, payroll budget management, and workforce scheduling.
Facilitating effective communication and partnerships between store team, regional management team, and other company partners.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Retail Management, Business, or a related field (Master's preferred)
